node.title: A Muslim and His Christian Mother
node.description: As a young child living in Saudi Arabia, India, and Great Britain, Taariq Patel grew up as a young conservative Muslim. However, his mother's reconversion to Christianity led Taariq to a deeper understanding of the truth and to his own life transformation. He was heavily trapped in the bondage of alcohol addiction, but through the redemptive power of Jesus Christ he was able to overcome.
